analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x0dcc6e4f98e734048689a63b824e89b8a58ed591.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_contracts/0x0dcc6e4f98e734048689a63b824e89b8a58ed591.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x0dcc6e4f98e734048689a63b824e89b8a58ed591.sol#18) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_a' of SafeMath.div (/unique_contracts/0x0dcc6e4f98e734048689a63b824e89b8a58ed591.sol#300) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_b' of SafeMath.div (/unique_contracts/0x0dcc6e4f98e734048689a63b824e89b8a58ed591.sol#300) is not in mixedCase
